review:
Doctor spends considerable amount of time in hearing about the problem and give various suggestions which actually helps in implementing one or the other. 

i have visited 4 to 5 times to the same doctor and every time i visit i have very nice experience with the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is so friendly and listen to our words with patience. She dont try to give more medicines and trying to cure the problems with natural remedies. Happy about the consultation .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly, and and very good listener. She try to understand the problem first and accordingly suggest the things which needs to be do.I am very happy with her treatment about my baby.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She does not try and listen to the patients and take feedback. As per her my son has developmental issues/sight issues which no other pediatrician raised till date. My son is a happy 3 yo who talks less but is very smart n due to cold his eyes are just a bit swollen. I did not find her good and to others seeking her advice, please avoid. ***** *** **** ****** ******** ******* ************* *** ***** *** *** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are visiting Sirisha Kusuma doctor for more than 3 1/2years, We feel comfortable to express all the concerns as she allows us, and spares time to hear. With minimal medications and simple advice and cures the kid ailments.

**** *** **** ** *** *****
She spends more time with toddlers and understand every concern and adresses all of them.
Provides very valuable suggestions
